response.overview: Moreover, cryptocurrency transactions generally do not include personal identifying information. 1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381 This makes it even more difficult for Coinbase or any other exchange to track down and identify a fraudulent address. 1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381 Unlike credit card payments or bank transfers, which include sender and receiver information, blockchain transactions only include wallet addresses that don’t reveal the identity of the individuals involved.1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381
response.title: Can Coinbase refund my money
